Sorry, i haven't been on the computer for a couple days and havent
been able to respond (I hope that someone else responded to you).

NBWRpg is not a computer game, so there's nothing to download.  It is a
really fun play-by-email yahoo group that combines fan fiction with roleplaying.

You can find out more by visiting our wiki (the link is on group site)
or by IM'ing one of the group leaders on yahoo IM.

I hope you stick around! Welcome!

-Kraftlos
